---
title: Apple Cider Braised Pork with Sweet Roasted Carrots - Homemade Method
ingredients: |-
  **B﻿raised Pork**

  * 4﻿ lb pork roast
  *  2﻿T avocado oil (olive oil works fine)
  * 2﻿ C apple cider
  * 2﻿ C chicken broth
  * 2﻿ T Dijon mustard
  * 1﻿ garlic head (the whole bulb)
  * 3﻿ rosemary sprigs
  * 4﻿ thyme sprigs
  * 1﻿ red onion cut into thick slices
  * 2﻿ apples cut into bite size wedges
  * s﻿alt
  * p﻿epper

    **S﻿weet Roasted Carrots**
  * 2﻿ lbs carrots cut into 3" pieces
  * 2﻿ T olive oil
  * 2﻿ T butter
  * 2﻿ T coconut sugar (can substitute white or brown sugar)
  * 2﻿ T honey
  * 1﻿ T balsamic vinegar
  * s﻿alt 
  * p﻿epper
directions: >-
  1. P﻿reheat oven to 325.

  2. C﻿ut pork into 4 equal pieces.

  3. P﻿at pork dry with paper towels and generously season with salt and pepper.

  4. H﻿eat oil in a dutch oven over medium-high heat.

  5. A﻿dd pork pieces in a single layer.  Sear 4-5 minutes per side until browned. This will take about 20 minutes.  You may need to do in batches.

  6. W﻿hile pork is searing, whisk cider, stock and mustard.

  7. I﻿f your dutch oven in not oven proof, transfer to oven proof dish large enough to hold all ingredients. Pour braising liquid over pork.  Arrange rosemary, thyme and garlic on top of pork.  Cover dish.

  8. B﻿raise for 1.5 hours.  Flip pork and continue cooking for another 1 hour.

  9. W﻿hile pork cooks, cut carrots and prepare sauce for carrots.

  10. C﻿ombine butter, sugar, hone and balsamic vinegar in small sauce pan.  Stir over medium heat until mixture boils.  Remove from heat.

  11. P﻿lace carrots on a baking sheet tossed with olive oil, salt and pepper.

  12. A﻿dd onions and apples to dish.  Cover and return to over for another 30 minutes. to finish cooking.

  13. R﻿emove pork from oven and let rest for 30 minutes in braising liquid.  

  14. W﻿hile pork rests, cook carrots.  Heat oven to 400.  Pour sauce of carrots and bake for about 20 minutes.

  15. B﻿efore serving roast, squeeze garlic head to release garlic.  Stir to combine.

  16. S﻿erve roast and carrots with generous ladel full of braising liquid, apples and onions and a side salad if desired.
category: main course
subcategory:
  - all in one casserole
totalTime: 4 hours
servings: "10"
rating: 1
ease: intermediate
needsMarinade: false
thumbnail: data:image/jpeg;base64,
---
